source: Consolidated from unified_data.json, events-database.js, events.json, and weekly_trends.json

fields.metadata.sources: Array of source files used to compile this dataset
fields.metadata.total_events: Total number of events in the dataset
fields.events[].name: Short name or title of the event
fields.events[].regions: Geographic regions affected by the event
fields.events[].affected_countries: List of countries affected by the event
fields.events[].polling_evidence: Related polling data or evidence of public opinion impact

notes: Master unified event database combining multiple attention data sources into a single timeline of 177 significant events. Includes impact scoring, sentiment analysis, and cross-referenced Google Trends data. Version 3.0 schema. Used by the one-year US global sentiment visualization.
